contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Zinder | native_name = | native_name_lang = fr<!-- ISO 639-2 code e.g. "fr" for French language --> | type = [[Regions of Niger|Region]] | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Zinder in Niger.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location within Niger | mapsize = frameless | latd = 13|latm = 42|lats = |latNS = N | longd = 9|longm = 12|longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:NE_type:adm1st_source:GNS-enwiki | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] | subdivision_name = {{flag|Niger}} | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = [[Capital (political)|Capital]] | seat = [[Zinder]] | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 145430 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 2916929 | population_as_of = 2011<ref>[http://www.stat-niger.org/statistique/file/Annuaires_Statistiques/Annuaire_ins_2011/population.pdf Annuaire statistique du Niger]</ref> | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = [[West Africa Time]] | utc_offset1 = +1 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Zinder Region''' is an administrative [[Regions of Niger|Region]] in [[Niger]], the capital of the Region is the [[Communes of Niger|Commune]] of [[Zinder]]. The Region covers 145,430 km². The Governor of Zinder Region is [[Yahaya Yandaka]].<ref>[http://nigerdiaspora.info/index.php/politique/politique/ouverture,-hier,-de-l%27institut-universitaire-de-technologie-(i.u.t)-de-zinder-%E2%80%A2-un-nouveau-tournant-dans-le-secteur-de-l%27enseignement-sup%C3%A9rieur-au-niger/ Ouverture, hier, de l'Institut Universitaire de Technologie (I.U.T) de Zinder : Un nouveau tournant dans le secteur de l'enseignement Supérieur au Niger]. Abdou Saïdou, ONEP Zinder-Diffa. 29 Octobre 2008.</ref> [[Image:Zinder Arrondissements.png|thumb|Right|250px|Departments of Zinder]] ==Divisions and borders== Zinder is divided into 5 [[Departments of Niger|Department]]s: * [[Goure Department]] * [[Magaria Department]] * [[Matameye Department]] * [[Mirriah Department]] * [[Tanout Department]] Zinder has the following foreign borders: *[[Yobe State|Yobe State, Nigeria]] - southeast *[[Jigawa State|Jigawa State, Nigeria]] - south *[[Katsina State|Katsina State, Nigeria]] - southwest Domestically, it borders the following Regions: *[[Agadez Region|Agadez]] - north *[[Diffa Region|Diffa]] - east *[[Maradi Region|Maradi]] - west ==See also== *[[Regions of Niger]] *[[Departments of Niger]] *[[Communes of Niger]] ==References== {{wikivoyage|Zinder|Zinder}} {{Reflist}} {{Regions and departments of Niger}} [[Category:Zinder Region| ]] [[Category:Regions of Niger]] {{Niger-geo-stub}}
